Chapter on the Wonderful Adornments of the Sovereign
Thus have I heard:
At one time, the Buddha was in the place of enlightenment in the wilderness of Magadha, having just attained perfect enlightenment.
The ground was firm, made of vajra;
It was adorned with the most wonderful jeweled wheels, various precious flowers, and pure maá¹‡i jewels;
The ocean of various appearances manifested endlessly;
Maá¹‡i jewels formed into banners, always emitting light, constantly producing wonderful sounds. Various jeweled nets, wonderful fragrant flower garlands, hung all around;
The king of maá¹‡i jewels manifested freely, raining inexhaustible jewels and various wonderful flowers scattered on the ground;
The jeweled trees were arranged in rows, with luxuriant branches and leaves.
By the Buddha's spiritual power, all the adornments of this enlightenment site were reflected within.
The Bodhi tree was lofty and extraordinary:
The trunks were made of lapis lazuli,
and the branches and twigs were composed of various wonderful treasures.
The treasure leaves were luxuriant, and the shade they cast was like clouds.
The treasure flowers were of various colors, and the branches spread out their shadows. They were also adorned with maá¹‡i jewels, which emitted a brilliant light, interspersed among the flowers.
The trees all emitted light, and within the light rained maá¹‡i jewels. Within the maá¹‡i jewels were bodhisattvas, their multitudes like clouds, appearing simultaneously.
Moreover, by the power of the TathÄgata's majestic spiritual power, the bodhi tree constantly emitted wonderful sounds, expounding the various teachings, endlessly.

The palaces and pavilions where the TathÄgata resided were vast and magnificently adorned, filling the ten directions. They were composed of various-colored maá¹‡i jewels and adorned with various treasure flowers;
the flowing lights of the various adornments were like clouds, gathering their reflections into banners between the palaces.

The assembly of bodhisattvas and the congregation of the Dharma realm all gathered there, appearing with the inconceivable light and sound of the king of maá¹‡i jewels, and the self-mastery and spiritual powers of the TathÄgata's realm all emerged from within;
The abodes and houses of all sentient beings all appeared as reflections within it.
Moreover, empowered by the spiritual power of the buddhas, in a single thought it encompassed the Dharma realm.
That lion throne was lofty, vast, and wondrous:
It had a maá¹‡i jewel as its platform, a lotus flower as its net, pure and wondrous jewels as its wheels, and various colored flowers as its garlands.
The pavilions, towers, steps, doors and windows, and all the objects and images were all perfectly adorned;
The branches and fruits of the jeweled trees were arranged in rows all around.
The clouds of maá¹‡i jewel light illuminated each other;

The transformed pearls and jade of the buddhas of the ten directions;ğŸ”½Here is the corrected and aligned text:ğŸ”½The Buddha Speaks the SÅ«tra of the Questions of the Bodhisattva on the Ocean of SamÄdhi, Scroll 1ğŸ”½Translated by Tripiá¹­aka Master KumÄrajÄ«va of the Later Qin Dynasty
The wonderful jewels in the topknots of all bodhisattvas all emitted light and came to illuminate.
Moreover, upheld by the majestic spiritual power of the buddhas, they expounded the vast realm of the TathÄgata. The wonderful sounds spread far and wide, reaching everywhere.

At that time, the World-Honored One, dwelling in this seat, attained supreme perfect enlightenment with regard to all dharmas. His wisdom entered the three times, all of which were equal. His body filled all worlds, and his voice universally harmonized with the lands of the ten directions.
It was like empty space, containing myriad forms, yet without discriminating among the various realms;
It was also like empty space, pervading everywhere, yet equally following conditions in the various lands.
His body always universally sat in all enlightenment sites, and among the assembly of bodhisattvas, his majestic light was brilliant, like the rising sun illuminating the world.
The great ocean of merit practiced in the three times had all been purified, yet he always manifested birth in the lands of buddhas.
boundless forms and appearances, perfect and bright, pervading the Dharma realm, equal and without distinction;
expounding all dharmas, like spreading a great cloud.
In each pore, able to contain all worlds without obstruction, each manifesting immeasurable spiritual powers, teaching and transforming all sentient beings;
the body pervading the ten directions without coming or going, the mind entering all characteristics, understanding the emptiness and quiescence of dharmas.
The spiritual transformations of all buddhas of the three times, all seen in the light;
all buddha lands and inconceivable eons of adornments, all made manifest.

There were ten buddha-realms' worth of bodhisattva-mahÄsattvas surrounding them, their names were:ğŸ”½Samantabhadra Bodhisattva-MahÄsattva, Supreme Lamp of Light of the Best of Merits Bodhisattva-MahÄsattva
, Lion Banner of Universal Light Bodhisattva-MahÄsattva, Bodhisattva

Bodhisattva MahÄsattva, Ocean Banner of Meritorious Virtues of Universal Sound, Bodhisattva MahÄsattva Illuminating the TathÄgata's Realm with Universal Wisdom Light, Bodhisattva MahÄsattva Universal Jewel Topknot Flower Banner,ğŸ”½Bodhisattva MahÄsattva Universal Awakening Pleasing Sound, Bodhisattva MahÄsattva Pure and Inexhaustible Meritorious Light,ğŸ”½Bodhisattva MahÄsattva Universal Radiance Appearance, Bodhisattva MahÄsattva Ocean Moon Bright Light,ğŸ”½

Bodhisattva MahÄsattva, Bodhisattva MahÄsattva Ocean Banner of Meritorious Qualities of Universal Sound, Bodhisattva MahÄsattva Universal Wisdom Light Illuminating the Realm of the TathÄgata, Bodhisattva MahÄsattva Universal Jeweled Topknot Flower Banner, Bodhisattva MahÄsattva Universal Awakening Pleasing Sound, Bodhisattva MahÄsattva Universal Purity Inexhaustible Meritorious Light, Bodhisattva MahÄsattva Universal Radiance Mark, Bodhisattva MahÄsattva Moon-Light of the Ocean Great Illumination, Bodhisattva MahÄsattva Cloud Sound Ocean Light Stainless Treasury, Bodhisattva MahÄsattva Meritorious Jewel Topknot Wisdom Born, Bodhisattva MahÄsattva King of Sovereign Merits Great Light, Bodhisattva MahÄsattva Well-Vigorous Lotus Topknot, Bodhisattva MahÄsattva Universal Wisdom Cloud Sun Banner, Bodhisattva MahÄsattva Greatly Diligent Vajra Peak, Bodhisattva MahÄsattva Incense Flame Light Banner, Bodhisattva MahÄsattva Greatly Luminous Virtue Profound Pleasing Sound, Bodhisattva MahÄsattva Great
Bodhisattva MahÄsattva of the Light of Blessings and Wisdom.
Such were the leaders, with as many as the dust particles in a Buddha-land.
These bodhisattvas had all previously gathered wholesome roots with Vairocana TathÄgata and cultivated bodhisattva practices;
They were all born from the ocean of the TathÄgata's wholesome roots, and the perfections were all fulfilled;
The wisdom eye was clear and penetrating, equally observing the three times;
In all samÄdhis, they were endowed with purity;
Their eloquence was like the ocean, vast and inexhaustible;
Endowed with the Buddha's merits, venerable and respectable;
They knew the faculties of sentient beings and transformed and subdued them as appropriate;
They entered the treasury of the Dharma realm, their wisdom being without distinction;
They realized the Buddha's liberation, profound and vast;
They were able to enter the one ground according to the expedient means, and with all the ocean of vows, they were always together with wisdom until the end of the future.

He thoroughly understood the rare, vast, and secret realm of the buddhas, well knew the equal Dharma of all buddhas, had already trod the ground of universal light of the TathÄgata, and entered the gateway to the ocean of immeasurable samÄdhis;
In all places, he manifested his body according to circumstances;
The practices of worldly dharmas, he all the same;
His dhÄraá¹‡Ä« was vast, gathering the ocean of various dharmas;
His eloquence was skillful, turning the irreversible wheel;
The ocean of merits of all tathÄgatas, all entered his body;
The buddha-lands of all buddhas, he went to them all according to his vows;
He had already made offerings to all buddhas for boundless eons, joyfully without weariness;
The places where all tathÄgatas attained enlightenment, he was always there, never leaving their side;
He always used the ocean of Samantabhadra's vows to enable all sentient beings to be fully endowed with the wisdom-body.
He accomplished such immeasurable merits and virtues.
There were also as many vajra-holding spirits as there are atoms in a buddha-realm, namely:

Vajra-holding spirit of wondrous form, vajra-holding spirit of the sun-disk's swift banner, vajra-holding spirit of Sumeru's flower light, vajra-holding spirit of pure cloud sounds, vajra-holding spirit of delightful faculties, vajra-holding spirit of delightful light, vajra-holding spirit of great tree thunder sounds, vajra-holding spirit of lion king's light, vajra-holding spirit of secret flame's excellent eyes, vajra-holding spirit of lotus light's maá¹‡i topknot...

These were the foremost, with as many as there are atoms in a buddha-realm, all of whom in the past for innumerable eons had constantly made great vows, vowing to always draw near and make offerings to the buddhas;
In accordance with their vows and practices, they had already perfected and reached the other shore;
They had accumulated boundless pure meritorious deeds, and had already illuminated the realm of practice in all samÄdhis;
They attained the power of spiritual penetrations, following the TathÄgata's abode, entering the inconceivable realm of liberation;
Dwelling in the assembly, their majestic light was especially penetrating, manifesting bodies in accordance with the dispositions of sentient beings and showing them how to be tamed;
Wherever the transformed forms of all buddhas were, they all followed the transformations and went there;
They always diligently guarded the abodes of all tathÄgatas.
There were also as many body spirits as there are dust motes in a buddha-realm, namely:

Body spirits with flower-adorned topknots, body spirits illuminating the ten directions, body spirits taming with ocean sounds, body spirits with pure flower-adorned topknots, body spirits with immeasurable deportment, body spirits with supreme light adornments, body spirits with pure light fragrant clouds, body spirits guarding and upholding, body spirits universally manifesting and embracing, body spirits with unmoving light...
These were the foremost, with as many as dust motes in a buddha-world, all of whom in the past had accomplished great vows and made offerings to and served all buddhas.
There were also as many as dust motes in a buddha-world of foot-traveling spirits, namely:

Jewel-seal-hand foot-traveling spirit, lotus-light foot-traveling spirit, pure-flower-topknot foot-traveling spirit, gathering all good views foot-traveling spirit, wondrous-jewel-star-banner foot-traveling spirit, delighting in emitting wondrous sounds foot-traveling spirit, sandalwood-tree-light foot-traveling spirit, lotus-light foot-traveling spirit, subtle-light foot-traveling spirit, accumulating wondrous flowers foot-traveling spirit...
These were the foremost, with as many as dust motes in a buddha-world, all of whom in the past for innumerable eons had been close to the TathÄgata and followed him without abandoning him.
There were also as many as dust motes in a buddha-world of assembly site spirits, namely:

These were the foremost, with as many as dust motes in a buddha-world, all of whom had encountered innumerable buddhas in the past, accomplished the power of vows, and extensively made offerings.
There were also as many as dust motes in a buddha-world of city-governing spirits, namely:

There were also immeasurable sun heavenly sons, namely:

Sun Heavenly Son, Flaming Eye Heavenly Son, Mount Sumeru Light Fearsome Respectful Banner Heavenly Son, Stainless Jewel Adornment Heavenly Son, Courageous Unremitting Heavenly Son, Wonderful Flower Garland Light Heavenly Son, Supreme Banner Light Heavenly Son, Jewel Topknot Universal Light Heavenly Son, Light Eye Heavenly Son, Upholding Superior Virtue Heavenly Son, Universal Light Heavenly Son, and so forth.
These were the foremost, their number immeasurable, all diligently cultivating and benefiting sentient beings, increasing their wholesome roots.
Furthermore, there were immeasurable kings of the Heaven of the Thirty-three Celestials, namely:

Åšakra-Indra, King of the Heaven of the Thirty-three Celestials, King of the Heaven of the Thirty-three Celestials with the Sound of Universal Acclamation, King of the Heaven of the Thirty-three Celestials with the Jewel Topknot of Compassionate Eyes, King of the Heaven of the Thirty-three Celestials with the Renown of the Banner of Jewel Light, King of the Heaven of the Thirty-three Celestials with the Topknot of Joyful Happiness, King of the Heaven of the Thirty-three Celestials with the Right Mindfulness of Delight, King of the Heaven of the Thirty-three Celestials with the Superior Sound of Mount Sumeru, King of the Heaven of the Thirty-three Celestials with Accomplished Mindfulness, King of the Heaven of the Thirty-three Celestials with the Pure Flower Light of Delight, King of the Heaven of the Thirty-three Celestials with the Sun of Wisdom as Eyes, King of the Heaven of the Thirty-three Celestials with the Light of Freedom that can Awaken.
These were the foremost, their number immeasurable, all diligently giving rise to the vast activities of the entire world.
Furthermore, there were immeasurable kings of the Heaven of YÄma, namely:

King of the Auspicious Time, King of the Delightful Light, King of Inexhaustible Wisdom and Meritorious Banner, King of Good Transformation and Grace, King of the Great Light of DhÄraá¹‡Ä«, King of Inconceivable Wisdom, King of the Wheel-holding Heaven, King of Flaming Light, King of Illuminating Light, King of Universal Observation and Great Renown, and so forth.
These were the foremost, their number being immeasurable. They all diligently cultivated vast roots of goodness and their minds were always content.
There were also inconceivably numerous kings of the Tuá¹£ita Heaven, namely:

King of Contentment, King of the Topknot of the Ocean of Joy, King of Supreme Meritorious Banner, King of Tranquil Light, King of the Delightful and Wonderful Eyes, King of the Pure Moon of the Jewel Peak, King of the Supreme Courageous Strength, King of the Wonderful Light of Adamantine, King of the Banner Adorned with Stars, King of the Delightful Adornments, and so forth.
These were the foremost, with an inconceivable number, all diligently remembering and upholding the names of all buddhas.
Furthermore, there were innumerable Paranirmita-vaÅ›avartin Heaven Kings, namely:

Good Transformation Heaven King, Silent Sound Light Heaven King, Transformation Power Light Heaven King, Adornment Lord Heaven King, Mindfulness Light Heaven King, Supreme Cloud Sound Heaven King, Various Wonderful Supreme Light Heaven King, Wonderful Topknot Light Heaven King, Accomplishing Joyful Wisdom Heaven King, Flower Light Topknot Heaven King, Universally Seeing the Ten Directions Heaven King...
These were the foremost, their number being immeasurable, all diligently subduing all beings and causing them to attain liberation.
Furthermore, there were innumerable Paranirmita-vaÅ›avartin Heaven Kings, namely:

King of Self-Mastery, King of Wonderful Eyes, King of Wonderful Crown Banner, King of Courageous Wisdom, King of Wonderful Sound Phrases, King of Wonderful Light Banner, King of the Gate of Tranquil Realm, King of Wonderful Wheel Adornment Banner, King of the Wisdom of Flower Stamens, King of the Light of Wonderful Adornments of Indra's Power.
These and others were the foremost, their number immeasurable, all diligently cultivating the vast Dharma door of self-mastery.
There were also innumerable great Brahma kings, namely:

Brahma King Shiqi, Brahma King of Wisdom Light, Brahma King of Good Wisdom Light, Brahma King of Universal Cloud Sound, Brahma King of Sovereign Sounds Observing the World, Brahma King of Eyes of Tranquil Light, Brahma King of Light Pervading the Ten Directions, Brahma King of Sound of Transformation, Brahma King of Eyes of Radiating Light, Brahma King of Ocean Sounds Pleasing the Mind.
These were the foremost, with countless others, all endowed with great compassion, pitying sentient beings, radiating light universally to illuminate and bring them happiness.
Furthermore, there were immeasurable light-sound celestial kings, namely:

Delightful Light Celestial King, Pure Wonderful Light Celestial King, Sovereign Sound Celestial King, Supreme Mindfulness Wisdom Celestial King, Delightful Pure Wonderful Sound Celestial King, Good Contemplation Sound Celestial King, Universal Sound Pervasive Illumination Celestial King, Profound Light Sound Celestial King, Stainless Renown Light Celestial King, Supreme Pure Light Celestial King...
These were the foremost, their number immeasurable, all abiding in the vast, tranquil, blissful, unobstructed Dharma door.
Furthermore, there were immeasurable universal purity celestial kings, namely:

Purely Renowned Heavenly King, Supreme Vision Heavenly King, Tranquil Virtue Heavenly King, Sumeru Sound Heavenly King, Pure Mindfulness Eye Heavenly King, Delightful Supreme Light Illuminating Heavenly King, Worldly Sovereign Heavenly King, Blazing Light Sovereign Heavenly King, Delighting in Contemplating Dharma Transformation Heavenly King, Transformation Banner Heavenly King, Constellation Sound Wonderful Adornment Heavenly King.
These were the foremost, their number immeasurable. They had all already peacefully abided in the vast Dharma gate and diligently benefited the world.
